summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 1.9°C) and outside temperature (down 1.7°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 6 mbar), rainfall (up 0.4 mm), light levels (up 3086 lux), and cloud levels (up 411 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1346 m), rainfall (up 0.1 mm), and light levels (up 5434 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 411.4m lower than yesterday, 955.5m lower than past week, 1346.4m lower than past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 860m to a maximum of 3110m, averaging 1461.9m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 2420m and 2810m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: Expect mostly clear skies with high cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, extremely heavy humidity levels. A few light raindrops may fall, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
